profile.name: Phani Kumar Vankadari
profile.title: SAP Technology Consultant - ABAP | Fiori | BTP | Integration | SAP Business AI

professionalSummary: SAP BTP and Integration Architect with 19 years of experience in ABAP, Fiori/UI5, CAP, and Integration Suite. Skilled in building scalable, cloud-based SAP solutions integrating S/4HANA, with a focus on automation, innovation, and business impact.
professionalSynopsis: Over 19 years of experience in SAP development and solution design, starting with ABAP and Fiori/UI5, integrations and later evolving into cloud technologies on SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP).

Skilled in architecting and implementing enterprise solutions using Integration Suite, SAP CAP, Build Process Automation (BPA), and Business AI, designed to work seamlessly with S/4HANA and SAP Fiori.
Strong background in SAP Integration Suite, FrenDS iPaaS, and Jitterbit, delivering secure and reliable integrations across SAP and non-SAP systems.
Hands-on experience in ABAP, OData, and BTP Mobile Services, combining solid technical knowledge with design thinking and a focus on automation, innovation, and business simplicity.

details: Experienced in designing and developing enterprise solutions on SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP).
Hands-on knowledge of SAP CAP, Fiori/UI5, and Build Process Automation (BPA).
Worked with Business AI and cloud extensions to build smart and practical applications that connect well with SAP S/4HANA.
Skilled in SAP Integration Suite (CPI), FrenDS iPaaS, and Jitterbit for connecting SAP and non-SAP systems.
Focused on creating secure, reliable, and scalable integrations that ensure smooth data flow across business systems.
Strong background in ABAP, OData services, and BTP Mobile Services.
Experience using Docker, Jenkins CI/CD, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), and Kubernetes to automate builds and improve performance.
Worked with SAP HANA, MySQL, and MongoDB databases for application and reporting needs.
Familiar with Outsystems for low-code app development and have a good understanding of solution design and DevOps practices on the cloud.

experience.title: Sr. BTP Architect
highlights: Designed and implemented an AI-assisted monitoring and notification framework for SAP Integration Suite.
Led innovation projects using SAP CAP, Joule, and SAP Build Process Automation (BPA).
Built POCs integrating SAP Business AI with Fiori.

experience.title: Senior SAP BTP / Fiori & Integration Consultant
highlights: Finance apps & ABAP enhancements for HMD Global.
Integrations for Nordec using CPI, FrenDS, Jitterbit.

experience.title: SAP Fiori / BTP Consultant & ABAP Developer
SAP ABAP Developer / Prototype Developer
highlights: Fiori prototypes for SAP Unified Demo Store.

experience.title: SAP ABAP Developer
highlights: Custom ABAP for Birds Eye Iglo.

achievements: Represented SAP Labs and partner companies in multiple hackathons and prototype challenges, winning recognition for innovative SAP-based solutions.
Awarded at iTech 2016 and What the Hack 2.0 for creating practical applications using Fiori, IoT, and AI-driven ideas.
